articles.author: Jasper Jolly
articles.title: Tevva begins first high-volume production of electric lorries in UK - The Guardian
articles.description: Startup firm making 7.5 tonne truck at Essex facility after receiving European type approval
articles.content:
The truck startup Tevva has become the first company to start high-volume production of electric lorries in the UK.
The company has started making its 7.5 tonne electric truck for customers at a fac… [+2466 chars]

articles.title: Twelve European countries broke temperature records in 2022 - The Guardian
articles.description: Continent records hottest ever summer as analysis shows temperatures rising twice as fast as global average
articles.content:
Twelve European countries broke monthly temperature records in 2022 as the continent recorded its hottest ever summer, new analysis shows.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: As mpox quickly fades in the US, observers wonder who deserves the credit? - Omineca Express
articles.description: Less than six months ago, mpox was an exploding health crisis. What had been an obscure disease from Africa was ripping through European and U.S. gay communities. Precious doses of an unproven vaccine were in short supply. International officials declared …
